title: Luxury group Kering launches bonds that can be changed for Puma shares
text:
Luxury group Kering launches bonds that can be changed for Puma shares

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 02:41AM ET)

PARIS (Reuters) - French luxury goods group Kering (PA: ) said it was launching an offer of bonds that could be exchanged for shares in Puma (DE: ), in which Kering already holds a 15.7% equity stake, to the tune of 500 million euros ($549.8 million). Kering added in a statement on Wednesday that the initial exchange price would represent an exchange premium of 30%-35% over a reference share price for Puma.
